String.string: Free Traders Collective
Enlightened Union
Iron Order
An organization that uses noctenium as a means to financial prosperity.
Members of the capitalist Free Traders Collective earn 1 percent more gold from loot.
An organization that studies noctenium for academic purposes.
Enlightened Union employs superior diplomatic influence. Members benefit from a 5 percent increase in reputation credits.
An organization that uses noctenium to achieve superhuman strength.
Iron Order provides superior physical advantages. Members receive 5 percent additional stun resistance.

You will leave the alliance and become a non-Alliance Member.

Open Specialty Stores

Allocate Specialty Stores to all villages ruled by alliances. Alliance policy points will be deducted every hour. If you don't have enough alliance policy points, the allocation will be automatically canceled.
